titles.short: Infected Memory
titles.full: Infected Memory

summaries.short: The Mithraic move forward with Marcus’ plan to rescue the children – but first, they have to find them. Back at the settlement, Campion and Paul bond while Mother taps into her memory archive.
summaries.full: Under Marcus’ command, the Mithraic set out on a deceptive path to rescue the children, and along the way, encounter a fellow survivor from the Ark. Back at the settlement, Campion and Paul bond during a hunting expedition with Father, Mother attempts to learn more about her origins, and Tempest’s trauma continues to haunt her.

titles.short: Raised by Wolves: Sn 1 / Ep 4 Recap
titles.full: Raised by Wolves: Sn 1 / Ep 4 Recap

summaries.short: Revisit the events from Sn 1 / Ep 4 of Raised by Wolves.
summaries.full: Revisit the events from Sn 1 / Ep 4 of Raised by Wolves.

titles.short: Lost Paradise
titles.full: Lost Paradise

summaries.short: As the Mithraic close in on the settlement, Mother finds herself distracted by intense feelings she didn’t know she was capable of having.
summaries.full: After reconnecting with her creator, Mother finds herself distracted by intense feelings she didn’t know she was capable of, leaving the settlement vulnerable to Marcus, Sue, and the Mithraic’s swift approach. As Campion continues to question his family’s principles, the other children’s loyalties are tested.

titles.short: Nature's Course
titles.full: Nature's Course

summaries.short: Father tries to teach the children how to hunt some of Kepler-22b’s mysterious creatures for food. Meanwhile, a stunning discovery ignites a conflict between Marcus and the Mithraic leader, Ambrose.
summaries.full: Determined to prove his utility to their family unit, Father tries to teach the children how to hunt some of Kepler-22b’s mysterious creatures for food. Meanwhile, after the Mithraic make a stunning discovery that potentially fulfills one of their prophecies, a debate about how to proceed ignites a conflict between Marcus and Ambrose, their leader.

titles.short: Ep. 3: Emotion AI -- Raised By Wolves Podcast
titles.full: Ep. 3: Emotion AI -- Raised By Wolves Podcast

summaries.short: Host Holly Frey chats with Rana el Kaliouby--the computer scientist CEO of Affectiva, a company whose goal is to humanize technology before it dehumanizes us--about how Emotion AI could revolutionize who we interface with technology, for better or for worse. Plus, show creator Aaron Guzikowski describes how he created the series' compassionate android caregivers and what obstacles a feeling computer could throw our way in the long run.
summaries.full: Host Holly Frey chats with Rana el Kaliouby--the computer scientist CEO of Affectiva, a company whose goal is to humanize technology before it dehumanizes us--about how Emotion AI could revolutionize who we interface with technology, for better or for worse. Plus, show creator Aaron Guzikowski describes how he created the series' compassionate android caregivers and what obstacles a feeling computer could throw our way in the long run.

summaries.full: Revisit the events from Sn 1 / Ep 5 of Raised by Wolves.

titles.short: Faces
titles.full: Faces

summaries.short: A power-hungry Marcus finds himself at odds with his family and challenged by Mother. Campion makes a fateful decision.
summaries.full: Struggling to maintain his clout as leader of the Mithraic, Marcus begins to make decisions that disturb his family, while Mother’s ability to see him for who he truly is threatens his power and puts her in a precarious position. With Tempest on his side, a strong-willed Campion finds himself at dangerous odds with the Mithraic.

titles.short: Raised by Wolves: Becoming a Necromancer
titles.full: Raised by Wolves: Becoming a Necromancer

summaries.short: Hear from Raised by Wolves star Amanda Collin, Ridley Scott and more as they discuss the character of Mother--an android who also happens to be a necromancer.
summaries.full: Hear from Raised by Wolves star Amanda Collin, Ridley Scott and more as they discuss the character of Mother--an android who also happens to be a necromancer.

titles.short: Raised by Wolves: Alien Fashion
titles.full: Raised by Wolves: Alien Fashion

summaries.short: Costume designer Janty Yates discusses outfitting the stars of Ridley Scott's HBO Max series Raised by Wolves.
summaries.full: Costume designer Janty Yates discusses outfitting the stars of Ridley Scott's HBO Max series Raised by Wolves.

titles.short: Raised by Wolves: Exodus
titles.full: Raised by Wolves: Exodus

summaries.short: From Executive Producer Ridley Scott, Raised by Wolves centers on two androids tasked with raising human children on a mysterious virgin planet. As the burgeoning colony of humans threatens to be torn apart by religious differences, the androids learn that controlling the beliefs of humans is a treacherous and difficult task.
summaries.full: From Executive Producer Ridley Scott, Raised by Wolves centers on two androids tasked with raising human children on a mysterious virgin planet. As the burgeoning colony of humans threatens to be torn apart by religious differences, the androids learn that controlling the beliefs of humans is a treacherous and difficult task.

titles.short: Ep. 2: Life on Other Planets -- Raised By Wolves Podcast
titles.full: Ep. 2: Life on Other Planets -- Raised By Wolves Podcast

summaries.short: Host Holly Frey sits down with exoplanetary astrobiologist Sara Seager--a member of the Kepler team that discovered 22b--to reveal the science behind finding a possible back-up Earth, and consider the moral issues that come with mankind looking for life-sustaining planets after they've treated this one so carelessly. Plus, show creator Aaron Guzikowski weighs in on the possibilities of life beyond planet Earth, and how such speculation helped inspire the series.
summaries.full: Host Holly Frey sits down with exoplanetary astrobiologist Sara Seager--a member of the Kepler team that discovered 22b--to reveal the science behind finding a possible back-up Earth, and consider the moral issues that come with mankind looking for life-sustaining planets after they've treated this one so carelessly. Plus, show creator Aaron Guzikowski weighs in on the possibilities of life beyond planet Earth, and how such speculation helped inspire the series.

titles.short: Virtual Faith
titles.full: Virtual Faith

summaries.short: Convinced that Mother is poisoning his new friends, Campion plans an escape, while Marcus and Sue attempt to mobilize a rescue party of their own.
summaries.full: When the Mithraic kids fall sick with a mysterious illness, Campion suspects Mother is poisoning them and plans an escape. As Mother and Father attempt to prove their good intentions, Marcus and Sue, desperate to get their son Paul back, work to convince the other surviving Mithraic to mobilize a rescue party for the children.

titles.short: Mass
titles.full: Mass

summaries.short: Marcus’ unrelenting devotion piques Sue’s suspicions. Mother experiences perceived malfunctions. Campion and Paul devise a secret plan.
summaries.full: As Marcus continues to embrace his Mithraic devotion, Sue and Paul’s distrust in him deepens. Meanwhile, Mother attempts to alleviate perceived malfunctions, Hunter works on a secret project with Father, and Campion and Paul devise an underground plan of their own.

titles.short: Pentagram
titles.full: Pentagram

summaries.short: After her confrontation with the Mithraic, Mother brings five of their children back to the settlement, where Campion does his best to make them feel at home. Meanwhile, Marcus struggles to survive alone on Kepler-22b.
summaries.full: After her confrontation with Marcus and the Mithraic, Mother takes five of their Earth-born children – Tempest, Paul, Hunter, Holly, and Vita – to live on the settlement. As she and Father attempt to put the shaken newcomers at ease, Marcus struggles to survive alone on Kepler-22b. Meanwhile, Campion tries to ingratiate his new friends but begins to question Mother’s motives.

titles.short: Ep. 4: Mithras -- Raised By Wolves Podcast
titles.full: Ep. 4: Mithras -- Raised By Wolves Podcast

summaries.short: Host Holly Frey and archeologist and lecturer David Walsh examine the religious cult that informed the show's devoutly spiritual pioneers.
